db_manager module¶

Database Management Module

This module provides a utility class, DatabaseManager, for managing a school database. It includes functionality for creating tables, CRUD operations for students, instructors, and courses, as well as registration and search functionality.

module:

database_manager

class db_manager.DatabaseManager(db_name='school_data.db')[source]¶

Bases: object

A class to manage database operations for a school system.

Handles SQLite database connections and operations for students, instructors, courses, and registrations.

Parameters:

db_name (str) – The name of the database file (default: “school_data.db”)

add_course(course_id, course_name, instructor_id=None)[source]¶

Adds a course to the database.

Parameters:

  • course_id (str) – The unique identifier for the course

  • course_name (str) – The name of the course

  • instructor_id (str, optional) – The ID of the instructor assigned to the course (default: None)

Returns:

None

Adds an instructor to the database.

Parameters:

  • instructor_id (str) – The unique identifier for the instructor

  • name (str) – The name of the instructor

  • age (int) – The age of the instructor

  • email (str) – The email address of the instructor

Returns:

None

Closes the database connection.

Returns:

create_tables()[source]¶

Creates the required database tables if they do not exist.

Tables created: - students - instructors - courses - registrations

Returns:

None

Retrieves all courses along with their instructor’s name (if assigned).

Returns:

A list of all courses with instructor details

Searches for records matching the query in students, instructors, and courses.

Returns:

Updates a course’s details in the database.

Parameters:

  • course_id (str) – The unique identifier for the course

  • course_name (str) – The updated name of the course

  • instructor_id (str, optional) – The updated instructor ID for the course (default: None)

Returns:

None

update_student_registrations(student_id, course_ids)[source]¶

Updates a student’s course registrations.

Removes all current registrations for the student and adds new ones.

Parameters:

  • student_id (str) – The unique identifier for the student

  • course_ids (list of str) – A list of course IDs to register the student in

Returns:

None
